page.title: 03RECREATION IN COUNTESTHORPE
page.content:
In Countesthorpe there are no leisure or sports centres; however, there are several sports amenities. There is cricket, football, bowls, squash and there is a dance club run by the Methodist church. There are also 3 rugby clubs in the area. The Community College provides facilities for many sports, including an all-weather pitch and a sports hall.
There is a youth club run by Countesthorpe College every Wednesday which has discos, snooker, table tennis,darts, refreshments and sometimes sporting activities in the gym. The surrounding countryside is ideal for keen joggers and cyclists and can give pleasant, panoramic views. Overall, Countesthorpe has lots for people of all ages to enjoy.
